title: The Silver Brumby: Bravery in the Bush
brief_description: From the classic Australian feature film, videos and TV series based on the much loved novels by Elyne Mitchell comes this new CD ROM. Untamed by man and unbroken in spirit, the Silver Brumby captures all the drama and spirit of Australian animals in their natural habitat, while teaching children about the importance of protecting our wildlife and assisting reading and comprehension skills. This CD ROM features 20 beautifully illustrated storybook pages, with several alternate conclusions, as well as 8 fun and challenging puzzles to solve. Suitable for ages 3-8.
